headline.main: BIG KISKA SHELLING A FIERY SPECTACLE; Correspondent, Who From a Plane Saw Naval Attack, Tells of Wide Desolation TERRIBLE DAMAGE DONE Hundreds of Japanese Believed Killed in Day of Fury From Heavy Warships and Sky

lead_paragraph: AN ALEUTIAN ADVANCE BASE, July 22 (Delayed) -- One of the heaviest sea bombardments ever fired was hurled today by a United States naval task force of both light and heavy units at the Japanese-held island of Kiska, the enemy's last finger-tip grip on the Aleutians.
abstract: Aleutians: Kiska shelled from air and sea
snippet: AN ALEUTIAN ADVANCE BASE, July 22 (Delayed) -- One of the heaviest sea bombardments ever fired was hurled today by a United States naval task force of both light and heavy units at the Japanese-held island of Kiska, the enemy's last finger-tip gri...

byline.original: By FOSTER HAILEYBy Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES
